identity.name: Clash of Shuttles
identity.file_extension_rule: Use .jsx for components (Project is React JS, not TS)

typography.installation: Import via Google Fonts in index.css: @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=JetBrains+Mono:wght@400;700&family=Manrope:wght@400;500;700&family=Unbounded:wght@400;700;900&display=swap');

rules: Primary color (#ccff00) is for Actions and Active States ONLY.
Backgrounds must be solid #09090b or #121214. No transparent backgrounds for overlays.

public_pages.visuals: Asymmetrical bento grids, large typography, negative space.

dashboard_pages.grid_mode: MODE B: THE CONTROL ROOM GRID
dashboard_pages.visuals: Dense data, high contrast borders, clear hierarchy.

mobile_bracket.interaction: Swipe to reveal rounds, collapsible match cards.

customization_rules.buttons: rounded-none font-bold uppercase tracking-wider border-2 border-transparent hover:border-primary hover:bg-transparent hover:text-primary transition-all duration-300
customization_rules.cards: rounded-xl border border-white/10 bg-card/50 backdrop-blur-sm hover:border-primary/50 transition-colors duration-300
customization_rules.inputs: rounded-lg bg-secondary/50 border-transparent focus:border-primary focus:ring-0 h-12

visual_enhancers.textures: Add a subtle noise texture overlay to the body: opacity-5 pointer-events-none fixed inset-0 z-50 mix-blend-overlay
visual_enhancers.borders: Use 'tracing beam' effect for active cards (animated border gradient)

transitions.page_load: initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }} animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }} transition={{ duration: 0.4, ease: 'easeOut' }}
transitions.list_stagger: variants={{ hidden: { opacity: 0 }, show: { opacity: 1, transition: { staggerChildren: 0.1 } } }}

motion.accessibility: Respect prefers-reduced-motion. Wrap animations in MotionConfig.

hero_backgrounds.alt: Badminton player smash action dark dramatic lighting
hero_backgrounds.usage: Landing page hero section background with overlay

decorative.usage: Background for 'Match of the Day' card

universal_guidelines.testing: All interactive elements MUST have a 'data-testid' attribute (kebab-case).
universal_guidelines.accessibility: Ensure 4.5:1 contrast ratio. Use 'sr-only' for icon-only buttons.
universal_guidelines.code_style: Use functional components with named exports for components, default exports for pages.
universal_guidelines.state_management: Use React Context or Zustand for global tournament state (live scores).
universal_guidelines.error_handling: Use Sonner toasts for all user feedback (success/error).

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Install dependencies: framer-motion, lucide-react, sonner, clsx, tailwind-merge.
2. Update tailwind.config.js with the new color palette and font families.
3. Create a 'Layout' component that handles the Navbar (Public vs Admin) and Footer.
4. Build the 'Bracket' component using CSS Grid/Flexbox (do not use a library unless necessary).
5. Ensure the 'Live Score' view is the most prominent feature on the mobile homepage.
6. Use the provided image URLs for all placeholder and hero images.
